newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NZ 98-day T-bills yield 7.615 percent at tender.
newsitem.headline: NZ 98-day T-bills yield 7.615 percent at tender.

text.p: The weighted average yield for NZ$75 million of 98-day treasury bills at Tuesday's tender was 7.615 percent versus 7.425 percent for a similar maturity at last week's tender, the Reserve Bank said.
The weighted average yield for NZ$75 million of 189-day treasury bills was 7.783 percent versus 7.545 percent for a similar maturity at last week's tender. Bids totalled NZ$205 million.
The weighted average yield for NZ$50 million of 350-day treasury bills was 7.980 percent versus 7.836 percent for a similar maturity at last week's tender. Bids totalled NZ$180 million.
